name: Mutant Spaceship
description:
This game has been made in under 10 hours for the Pygame New Year's Jam (2022).

You control a spaceship which can shoot lasers. Keep shooting at enemy spaceships to get points. For Every 100 points, there is an opportunity to mutate your spaceship, and choose a certain ability that you can use to keep scoring more points.

In case you want to run the game from the source itself, the Source Code  can be found Here
